Question
========

We want to estimate how many people will vote for the PvdA in the upcoming elections. will vote for the PvdA. With a *confidence* level of 95% we want to have a *margin of error* equal to 0.03 (m = 0.03). At the so-called safe approach to this problem, how large should the random sample then be?

Answerlist
----------

* 32
* 544
* 1067

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 32: Incorrect
* 544: Incorrect
* 1067: Correct
